faq.weather: How do I check weather forecasts?
faq.weatherAnswer: You can check detailed weather forecasts on our Weather page, which provides current conditions and a 7-day forecast for your location.
faq.crops: What crops should I plant this season?
faq.cropsAnswer: The best crops to plant depend on your soil type, climate, and the current season. Our assistant can provide recommendations based on your specific location.
faq.schemes: How do I apply for government schemes?
faq.schemesAnswer: Visit our Schemes page to see all available government schemes and subsidies. Each scheme has detailed information about eligibility criteria and application procedures.
faq.market: Where can I check current crop prices?
faq.marketAnswer: You can find current market prices for various crops in our Market section. We update prices daily from major agricultural markets across the country.
faq.pests: How do I deal with crop pests?
faq.pestsAnswer: For pest management, use our Learning Hub which has guides on common crop diseases and pests, along with organic and chemical control methods.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: KrishiBandhu aims to bridge the information gap faced by farmers in India by providing easy access to essential agricultural information, government schemes, weather updates, and expert advice.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To create a digitally empowered farming community in India that can make informed decisions to improve agricultural productivity and economic well-being.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2023, KrishiBandhu was born from a simple observation: despite numerous government initiatives, many farmers lack access to information about schemes and modern farming practices. Our platform brings together all these resources in one place, in languages farmers understand.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Our team consists of agricultural experts, technologists, and rural development professionals passionate about improving Indian agriculture.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does loan approval take?
faq.a1: The loan approval typically takes 7-10 business days after submission of all required documents.
faq.q2: Can I repay my loan early?
faq.a2: Yes, you can repay your loan early without any prepayment penalties.
faq.q3: What happens if I miss a payment?
faq.a3: A grace period of 7 days is provided, after which a late fee will be applied. Please contact our support team if you anticipate payment difficulties.
faq.a4: Yes, a nominal processing fee of 1% of the loan amount is charged.
